thought: The website is accessible, now I need to extract the text from the HTML to look for any signs of scam characteristics.
observation: GLOBISCOINX  Home About What We Do Plans FAQs Contact Us Account Login Select Language Afrikaans Albanian Translate Find & Compare The Best Lifetime Financial Planning We Put You First Fixed Income Securities We are the leading investment managers servicing a wide range of institutional investors, family offices and high net worth individuals. Join us now Read Brochure Licensed Brokers GLOBISCOINX Limited is licensed by IBC in Cyprus (Trading Point of Financial Instruments Limited), Globally Renowned We have clients from over 196 countries and staff speaking over 30 languages. You First At GLOBISCOINX Limited you come first regardless of net capital worth, account type or size of investment. Who We Are GLOBISCOINX LTD is a company founded in Limassol Cyprus with our Head Office now locted in London, The United Kingdom. GLOBISCOINX Limited is listed on the Stock Exchange (ASX) and has exposure to a portfolio of leading international absolute return funds and selected direct investments in subordinated debt and equity co-investments. Our values and goals About us GLOBISCOINX Limited is one of the leading trade platform with a high payout, we offer the most generous payouts in the industry. Our Clients come first and your data remains private and secured with the latest sever security technology, we stay protected 24/7 Core Technology services Our services All services Cryptocurrency Mining & Trading Cryptocurrency mining and trading industries came and took the financial market by storm. Over the years investments in this fields has been very encouraging and profiting, the best part is yet to be experienced. Non-Farm The Non-farm payrolls report is one of the most anticipated economic news reports in the forex markets. It is published the first Friday of the month at 8:30AM Eastern time by the U.S. Bureau of labor statistics. Stock & Commodities Investments There are several ways to invest in commodities. One is to purchase varying amounts of physical raw commodities. Investors can also invest through the use of futures contracts or exchange-traded products(ETPs). You should choose us Exclusive benefits Over the years putting our clients first has made us a very successful company as their satisfaction sends goodwill messages about us to the world and has attracted investors from all works of life to our ever expanding community. 24/7 Customer Support Our seasoned teams creates a financing packages well tailored to suit your needs and we do everything in our power to help make your plans a success and ensure your investments flourishes. Quality and Reliability We offer quality and reliable services ranging from Cryptocurrency Mining Investments, Cryptocurrency Trading Investments, Forex Trading, Stock and Commodities Investment, and General Investment Consultancy. Robust Finance Planning We work with a range of financial partners and we are always at the beck and call international investors ready for business and we set a suitable platform which helps you achieve your goals financially. STANDARD PLAN $ 100.00 $999.00 To earn 18X Re-Investment Register Now PREMIUM PLAN 10X DELUXE PLAN 10,000.00 SHAREHOLDER PLAN $100,000,000.00 GLOBISCOINX Limited is in direct partnership with Blockchian network activities which offers the best bitcoin mining service without any use of expensive equipment . thought: The website https://globiscoinx.com/ is a scam website. {

observation.reason: The website makes unrealistic claims about investment returns has ambiguous company information and offers unusually high returns for low investment amounts.
